name: Spiriter
description:
This game is made in 48h Global GameJam.

You are the dead grandma of a haunted house and you got six cameras all around the house. The family forgot to take the baby to the trip and ghosts want to take the baby for his soul. You have to save him with your magical wand by clicking ghosts. Also, the baby is unpredictable, so you have to find him in cameras.

Ataberk Palacıoğlu - Programmer & VFX Design

Seher Aydoslu - Art Design

Oğulcan Devrim Kayhan - Sound Design
